recoverable_amount_determination: Fair value less costs of disposal
ias_36_impairment_of_assets.discount_rate_assumptions: Disclosed and reasonable/Not disclosed or questionable
ias_36_impairment_of_assets.growth_rate_assumptions: Disclosed and reasonable/Not disclosed or aggressive
ias_36_impairment_of_assets.reason_of_the_status: Overall assessment based on impairment testing rigor, CGU identification, recoverable amount determination methodology, and disclosure of key assumptions.
ias_36_impairment_of_assets.status_reference: Impairment of assets note, accounting policies, critical estimates disclosure

ias_37_provisions_contingent_liabilities.provisions_recognition: Recognized when criteria met/Over or under-recognized
ias_37_provisions_contingent_liabilities.reason_of_the_status: Assessment based on the recognition of a present obligation, use of best estimate, and adequate disclosure of contingencies.
ias_37_provisions_contingent_liabilities.status_reference: Provisions note, contingent liabilities note, commitments note

ias_38_intangible_assets.reason_of_the_status: Assessment of recognition criteria (especially for internally generated intangibles), amortization method appropriateness, and useful life assumptions.
ias_38_intangible_assets.status_reference: Intangible assets note, accounting policies, research & development costs note

ias_40_investment_property.investment_property_identified: Clearly distinguished from PPE/Not clearly identified
ias_40_investment_property.fair_value_determination: Based on market evidence/Level 3 with unobservable inputs
ias_40_investment_property.disposals_accounting: Gain/loss recognized in P&L/Not properly recognized
ias_40_investment_property.reason_of_the_status: Assessment based on correct identification, consistent application of chosen model (fair value or cost), and adequacy of fair value disclosures.
ias_40_investment_property.status_reference: Investment property note, fair value measurement note, accounting policies

ias_41_agriculture.reason_of_the_status: Standard not applicable as the entity does not have agricultural activity or biological assets.

ifrs_1_first_time_adoption.reason_of_the_status: Standard not applicable as the entity is not a first-time adopter of IFRS.
ifrs_1_first_time_adoption.status_reference: Basis of preparation note (should state IFRS adopted in prior years)

ifrs_2_share_based_payment.vesting_conditions: Properly considered in fair value/Not considered
ifrs_2_share_based_payment.modifications_cancellations: Accounted for per IFRS 2/Not accounted for
ifrs_2_share_based_payment.reason_of_the_status: Assessment based on recognition of expense over vesting period, use of fair value at grant date, and completeness of disclosures.
ifrs_2_share_based_payment.status_reference: Share-based payment note, employee benefits note, directors' remuneration report

ifrs_3_business_combinations.disclosures_complete: Adequate per IFRS 3 (purchase price, fair values, goodwill)/Inadequate
ifrs_3_business_combinations.reason_of_the_status: Assessment of acquisition accounting, including fair value allocation to net assets, goodwill calculation, and disclosure of pro-forma information.
ifrs_3_business_combinations.status_reference: Business combinations note, goodwill note, accounting policies for acquisitions

ifrs_5_non_current_assets_held_for_sale.measurement_basis: Lower of carrying amount and fair value less costs to sell/Measured incorrectly
ifrs_5_non_current_assets_held_for_sale.discontinued_operations: Presented separately in P&L/Not presented separately
ifrs_5_non_current_assets_held_for_sale.presentation_separate: Separate line item in statement of financial position/Not separate
ifrs_5_non_current_assets_held_for_sale.reason_of_the_status: Assessment based on strict classification criteria met, correct measurement at the lower of carrying amount and FVLCTS, and separate presentation.
ifrs_5_non_current_assets_held_for_sale.status_reference: Assets held for sale note, discontinued operations note, cash flow statement

ifrs_6_exploration_for_and_evaluation_of.exploration_evaluation_assets: N/A - Not an extractive industry entity
ifrs_6_exploration_for_and_evaluation_of.reason_of_the_status: Standard not applicable as the entity is not in the extractive industries.

ifrs_7_financial_instruments_disclosures.categories_financial_instruments: Disclosed per IFRS 9 categories/Not clearly disclosed
ifrs_7_financial_instruments_disclosures.reason_of_the_status: Assessment of the completeness and clarity of quantitative and qualitative disclosures about the nature, extent, and management of financial risks.
ifrs_7_financial_instruments_disclosures.status_reference: Financial instruments risk management note, fair value measurement note, accounting policies for financial instruments

ifrs_8_operating_segments.reason_of_the_status: Assessment based on identification of segments based on internal reporting, disclosure of segment P&L and assets, and reconciliations to consolidated figures.
ifrs_8_operating_segments.status_reference: Segment reporting note, management commentary, accounting policies for segments

classification_categories: Fair value through profit or loss
Fair value through other comprehensive income
ifrs_9_financial_instruments.reason_of_the_status: Assessment of classification based on business model and cash flow characteristics, application of ECL model, and hedge accounting (if applied).
ifrs_9_financial_instruments.status_reference: Financial instruments accounting policies, impairment note, hedge accounting note

ifrs_10_consolidated_financial_statement.control_assessment: Based on power, exposure to variable returns, ability to affect returns/Assessment flawed
ifrs_10_consolidated_financial_statement.loss_of_control: Accounted for per IFRS 10/No loss of control
ifrs_10_consolidated_financial_statement.investment_entities: Entity is/is not an investment entity/Disclosure incomplete
ifrs_10_consolidated_financial_statement.reason_of_the_status: Assessment of control definition application, full consolidation of all subsidiaries, and presentation of non-controlling interests.
ifrs_10_consolidated_financial_statement.status_reference: Basis of consolidation note, list of principal subsidiaries, NCI note

ifrs_11_joint_arrangements.separate_financial_statements: Investments at cost or equity method/Not applicable
ifrs_11_joint_arrangements.reason_of_the_status: Assessment of correct classification (joint operation vs. venture) and application of appropriate accounting (equity method for ventures).
ifrs_11_joint_arrangements.status_reference: Investments in joint arrangements note, accounting policies for joint arrangements

ifrs_12_disclosure_of_interests_in_other.reason_of_the_status: Overall assessment of the completeness of disclosures about the nature, risks, and effects of interests in subsidiaries, joint arrangements, associates, and structured entities.
ifrs_12_disclosure_of_interests_in_other.status_reference: Interests in other entities note, list of investments, related party note for structured entities
